emails.mfaEnabled.body:
Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled for your {{project}} account.

Please make sure to store your security codes safely, so you can use them if you lose or canâ€™t access your mobile device. Each recovery code can only be used once, but you can re-generate a new set of 6 codes at any time.
emails.mfaDisabled.body: You've disabled two-factor authentication for your {{project}} account. You can always enable it again through your {{project}} account.
